website_summaries.verdict: Quirks aside, it offers impressive power and run time for a fraction of the price of other portable Caterpillar generators – the best choice if your main priority is keeping to a budget.
pros: An affordable powerhouse that earns praise for powering larger appliances, including freezers and refrigerators
Also offers features comparable to pricier models, including 13-hour run time, 5 outlets, and LED control panel
cons: For the lower wattage, it takes a surprising amount of gas to operate
Some of the components don't seem very durable

customer_reviews.title: This Cat Keep My Home Up and Running
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for this coming Hurricane season. I live in Palm Coast, FL and we just had Irma come though last week. Was without power for 5 days. This Cat ran fridge, TV, small AC unit, coffee maker, and some lights. It started on the first pull and never let me down. Was getting a little over 12 hours of run time before I would have to refuel. I could not be happier with the way it ran. Had to change oil on a few occasions which only took 10 min. If your looking for a small generator that will keep items running with the power being out you can't go wrong with this CAT RP3600.
customer_reviews.author: D. Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a year ago, sat in the box in my garage for over a year. Finally opened it up last month and was pleasantly surprised. It maneuvers better then any generator I've used before. Balance is good and the ability to fold the handle down makes it great for storage and transporting. Starting the unit is surprisingly easy. My chain saw is harder to start then this. All controls are on the front and easy to access. Used the RV receiver 30amp with an adapter and used a inverter welder (110v) fabricated drill pipe fencing. Worked GREAT. Be sure to use non ethanol fuel and this generator won't let you down.
customer_reviews.author: Tram

customer_reviews.title: Great power for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Runs my portable a/c, my large side by side refrigerator as well as my chest freezer and a smaller refrigerator too. I could probably but a few more things on this unit, but those are the essentials. It wasn't really all that loud either. I think my neighbor's lawnmower is louder. It's not a quiet inverter generator to be sure, but it has way more power for much less money. I bought this unit as backup power for my home after a hurricane. You can run regular 87 octane gasoline that is 10% or less ethanol.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after we'd lost power for 4 days due to Hurricane Michael. Our power was restored before we received it, and I learned that my nephew in Panama City will be out of power for months, so I sent this to him. He needs it more than I do right now.
customer_reviews.author: DancingQueen

customer_reviews.title: great generator
customer_reviews.text: great generator. starts right up - easy to change oil. hope we will never have to use it!
customer_reviews.author: cookie

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It started right up first pull
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It started right up first pull. It runs really good. Vary good quality. I highly recommend this. It is awesome 👍.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Meow
customer_reviews.text: I like it when my Amazon orders arrive a day early. I bought this generator to power a compact AC unit in my semi truck so it's not necessary to idle the truck engine overnight when it is 110° outside. My old Peterbilt has a CAT engine, and now it has a CAT generator.
customer_reviews.author: Clark

customer_reviews.title: Ex. Investment, does all I want it to ...
customer_reviews.text: Ex. Investment, does all I want it to do, changed the spark plug to an NGK plugs, made I d Ex. Investment, does all I want it to do, replace the spark plug with a NGK, made a difference, starts quicker, (1) pull.
customer_reviews.author: Ronbo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, pretty efficient on fuel.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little generator. We recently used one of these during the aftermath of hurricane Florence. Our neighbors evacuated and let us use it while they were gone. We ran two full size refrigerators, a box fan, television and an Xbox with no problems at all. It ran about twelve to thirteen hours a day and did not burn through gas as fast as I though it would. It was also very easy to use and I liked the amount of outlets it had. I am planning on purchasing one for our family.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: i love it
customer_reviews.text: It seems Caterpillar has expanded well beyond bulldozers and other heavy industrial equipment. Probably a smart move as long as they adhere to hight standards of quality. Never having heard of this brand in relation to portable generators, I had no idea what to expect, and so far I don't see a reason to think otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Cat RP3600 3600 Running Watts/4500 Starting Watts Gas Powered Portable Generator 502-3684
product_meta.description:
Style:California CARB CompliantThe small but sturdy 502-3684 Rp3600 Cat portable generator includes the Cat 212 cc, OHV engine that has been designed for power, durability & quiet operation; it comes with a heavy-duty all-steel construction, never-flat rubber wheels & a double folding handle. 

All Cat generators are easy to set up & operate with simple, intuitive controls & an led-lit control panel which makes it easy to operate even in the dark. This 502-3684 portable generator comes with a 36 month limited warranty when product is registered within 30 days & a 24/7/365 Toll free & online support from caterpillar. 

The Cat 502-3684 generator includes enhanced safety features such as recessed sockets with waterproof covers. This compact, affordable 502-3684 Cat generator will generate 3600 running / 4500 starting which is enough power to keep the critical items you need running.
feature_bullets: Powers You For Up To 13 Hours
Padded, Double Hinged Handle and Solid Rubber Wheels
Wheels, Assembly Tools, Engine Oil and Funnel Included
3-Year Limited Warranty for Parts and Service for Full Term
